thread.title: Mike Krzyzewski to Step Down as USA Basketball Coach After 2016
thread.title_full: Mike Krzyzewski to Step Down as USA Basketball Coach After 2016

author: Kelly Terez
title: Mike Krzyzewski to Step Down as USA Basketball Coach After 2016
text:
Share Article 
Lance King/Getty Images (DURHAM, N.C.) -- The coach for the U.S. men's basketball national team is stepping down after the 2016 Olympics. 
According to ESPN , Duke University Coach Mike Krzyzewski said the next Olympic games will be his last coaching the national team. 
"It is. It definitely is,'' Krzyzewski told ESPN. "I think it's time to move ahead. During the next season there will be a number of decisions made about the future of USA Basketball with Rio [the roster] and coaching." 
Since he was hired in 2005, Krzyzewski has held a 75-1 record and helped the U.S. team win gold medals in Beijing in 2008 and in 2012 in London. 
Copyright   Monday, October 19, 2015 at 7:25PM
